values.value: SELECT  count(*) count  FROM fnd_attached_docs_form_vl att,    FND_DOCUMENTS_SHORT_TEXT st,   FND_DOCUMENTS_LONG_TEXT lt,   FND_DOCUMENTS_VL fd WHERE att.entity_name = 'AP_INVOICES'  AND att.function_name = 'APXINWKB'  AND att.media_id      = st.media_id(+)  AND att.media_id      = lt.media_id(+)  AND att.document_id   = fd.document_id  and att.pk1_value = '12911'
